scripts.build: concurrently -c yellow,magentaBright,blueBright -n ofunc,oproxy,ocheck "cd ofunc && pnpm build" "cd oproxy && pnpm build" "cd ocheck && pnpm build"
scripts.build:watch: concurrently -c yellow,magentaBright,blueBright -n ofunc,oproxy,ocheck "cd ofunc && pnpm build:watch" "cd oproxy && pnpm build:watch" "cd ocheck && pnpm build:watch"
scripts.fmt: concurrently -c yellow,magentaBright,blueBright -n ofunc,oproxy,ocheck "cd ofunc && pnpm fmt" "cd oproxy && pnpm fmt" "cd ocheck && pnpm fmt"
